body_html: I dont think there's any good reason, as far as I could see. The only possible fix is to recompile gcc, setting particular makefiles so that OpenMP has fPIC flag. I've attempted it a couple of months ago, but couldn't make progress.

body: I dont think there's any good reason, as far as I could see. The only possible fix is to recompile gcc, setting particular makefiles so that OpenMP has fPIC flag. I've attempted it a couple of months ago, but couldn't make progress.
